parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the VGRS ECU can cause the steering wheel to spin unexpectedly, leading to loss of control, accidents, or near-miss situations.
symptoms: The steering wheel spins to 180 degrees
the VGRS light illuminates on the dashboard
the vehicle pulls to one side while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The damage to the steering column can cause loss of power steering, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or near-miss situations.
symptoms: The horn and GPS do not function
some warning indicators do not illuminate
the spiral cable needs to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of control, accidents, or near-miss situations.
symptoms: the vehicle pulls to one side while driving
the vehicle cuts off while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A loose spark plug can cause engine stalling, engine knock, and potentially lead to engine failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Relay Failure (Foglights, Rear Heat, and Parking Brakes)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of relays can cause foglights, rear heat, and parking brakes to malfunction, which can lead to reduced visibility, accidents, or loss of control.
An unreadable speedometer can cause drivers to unknowingly speed or have difficulty maintaining a safe speed, which can lead to accidents or traffic violations.
The failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash can increase the risk of injury or fatality to occupants.
symptoms: Airbags do not deploy in a crash
failure of airbag warning light to illuminate
no airbag deployment in a head-on collision.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Delays or unavailability of recall repairs can leave vehicles with safety-critical defects on the road, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Parts not available for recall repairs
lack of communication from dealers or manufacturers regarding recall repairs
extended wait times for recall repairs.
